response.overview: A look at the life of Cecil Gaines, who served eight presidents as the White House's head butler from 1952 to 1986, and had a unique front-row seat as political and racial history was made.
response.tagline: One quiet voice can ignite a revolution.
response.title: The Butler

titles.title: El mayordomo de la Casa Blanca

release_dates.note: Rio de Janeiro International Film Festival

results.name: The Butler Official Trailer #2 (2013) - Forest Whitaker, Robin Williams Movie HD
